text: Tara ki sudhu se parinamera apeksa kare? Yedina se parinama prakasa pabe, sedina yara age setara katha bhule giyechila tara balabe, â€˜amadera rabera rasulagana to satyabani enechilena, amadera ki emana kono suparisakari ache ye amadera jan'ya suparisa karabe athaba amaderake ki abara pherata pathano habe-- yena amara age ya karatama ta theke bhinna kichu karate pari?â€™ Abasya'i tara nijederake ksatigrasta kareche ebam tara ye mithya ratana karata, ta tadera kacha theke hariye geche
